targets.rawSql:
with last_chain_stats as (
  SELECT
    chain,
    import_type,
    last(errors_count, datetime) as errors_count,
    last(not_covered_yet, datetime) as not_covered_yet,
    last(success_count, datetime) as success_count,
    last(errors_count, datetime) + last(not_covered_yet, datetime) as total_work
  FROM import_state_metrics_ts
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(datetime)
    and chain in ($chains)
    and import_type in ('product:investment', 'product:share-rate')
  group by 1,2
), first_chain_stats as (
  SELECT
    chain,
    import_type,
    first(errors_count, datetime) as errors_count,
    first(not_covered_yet, datetime) as not_covered_yet,
    first(success_count, datetime) as success_count,
    first(errors_count, datetime) + first(not_covered_yet, datetime) as total_work
  FROM import_state_metrics_ts
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(datetime)
    and chain in ($chains)
    and import_type in ('product:investment', 'product:share-rate')
  group by 1,2
)
select 
  --sum(f.errors_count) as errors_count_before,
  --sum(l.errors_count) as errors_count_now,
  case when sum(f.errors_count) = 0 then 0 else (sum(l.errors_count) - sum(f.errors_count))/sum(f.errors_count) end as error_progress,
  --sum(f.success_count) as success_count_before,
  --sum(l.success_count) as success_count_now,
  --case when sum(f.success_count) = 0 then 0 else (sum(l.success_count) - sum(f.success_count))/sum(f.success_count) end as success_count_progress,
  --sum(f.not_covered_yet) as not_covered_yet_before,
  --sum(l.not_covered_yet) as not_covered_yet_now,
  case when sum(f.not_covered_yet) = 0 then 0 else (sum(l.not_covered_yet) - sum(f.not_covered_yet))/sum(f.not_covered_yet) end as not_covered_yet_progress,
  --sum(f.total_work) as total_work_before,
  --sum(l.total_work) as total_work_now,
  case when sum(f.total_work) = 0 then 0 else (sum(l.total_work) - sum(f.total_work))/sum(f.total_work) end as total_work_progress
from last_chain_stats l
 left join first_chain_stats f on l.chain = f.chain and l.import_type = f.import_type

with last_metrics as (
  SELECT
    chain,
    import_type,
    last(errors_count, datetime) as errors_count,
    last(not_covered_yet, datetime) as not_covered_yet,
    last(success_count, datetime) as success_count,
    last(errors_count, datetime) + last(not_covered_yet, datetime) as total_work
  FROM import_state_metrics_ts
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(datetime)
    and chain in ($chains)
    and import_type in ('product:investment', 'product:share-rate')
  group by 1,2
)
select 
  chain,
  sum(total_work) as total_work
from last_metrics
group by 1

with last_metrics as (
  SELECT
    chain,
    import_type,
    last(errors_count, datetime) as errors_count,
    last(not_covered_yet, datetime) as not_covered_yet,
    last(success_count, datetime) as success_count,
    last(errors_count, datetime) + last(not_covered_yet, datetime) as total_work
  FROM import_state_metrics_ts
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(datetime)
    and chain in ($chains)
    and import_type in ( 'product:share-rate')
  group by 1,2
)
select 
  chain,
  sum(total_work) as total_work
from last_metrics
group by 1

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  sum(errors_count) as errors_count,
  --success_count as success_count,
  sum(not_covered_yet) as not_covered_yet,
  sum(errors_count) + sum(not_covered_yet) as total_work
FROM import_state_metrics_ts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime)
  and chain in ($chains)
  and import_type in ('product:investment', 'product:share-rate')
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  chain,
  datetime AS "time",
  --sum(errors_count) as errors_count,
  --success_count as success_count,
  --sum(not_covered_yet) as not_covered_yet,
  sum(errors_count) + sum(not_covered_yet) as total_work
FROM import_state_metrics_ts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime)
  and chain in ($chains)
  and import_type in ('product:investment', 'product:share-rate')
group by 1, 2
ORDER BY 2

with last_chain_stats as (
  SELECT
    chain,
    last(errors_count, datetime) as errors_count,
    last(not_covered_yet, datetime) as not_covered_yet,
    last(success_count, datetime) as success_count,
    last(errors_count, datetime) + last(not_covered_yet, datetime) as total_work
  FROM import_state_metrics_ts
  WHERE

    and chain in ($chains)
    and import_type = 'product:investment'
  group by 1
), first_chain_stats as (
  SELECT
    chain,
    first(errors_count, datetime) as errors_count,
    first(not_covered_yet, datetime) as not_covered_yet,
    first(success_count, datetime) as success_count,
    first(errors_count, datetime) + first(not_covered_yet, datetime) as total_work
  FROM import_state_metrics_ts
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(datetime)
    and chain in ($chains)
    and import_type = 'product:investment'
  group by 1
)
select 
  --sum(f.errors_count) as errors_count_before,
  --sum(l.errors_count) as errors_count_now,
  case when sum(f.errors_count) = 0 then 0 else (sum(l.errors_count) - sum(f.errors_count))/sum(f.errors_count) end as error_progress,
  --sum(f.success_count) as success_count_before,
  --sum(l.success_count) as success_count_now,
  --case when sum(f.success_count) = 0 then 0 else (sum(l.success_count) - sum(f.success_count))/sum(f.success_count) end as success_count_progress,
  --sum(f.not_covered_yet) as not_covered_yet_before,

  case when sum(f.not_covered_yet) = 0 then 0 else (sum(l.not_covered_yet) - sum(f.not_covered_yet))/sum(f.not_covered_yet) end as not_covered_yet_progress,
  --sum(f.total_work) as total_work_before,
  --sum(l.total_work) as total_work_now,
  case when sum(f.total_work) = 0 then 0 else (sum(l.total_work) - sum(f.total_work))/sum(f.total_work) end as total_work_progress
from last_chain_stats l
 left join first_chain_stats f on l.chain = f.chain

SELECT datetime, rpc_url, request, response
FROM rpc_error_ts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime)
  and chain in ($chains)
ORDER BY 1 desc
limit 20
